description:
Create an agent that performs the back office automation required to onboard a new employee. This is not a chat experience agent but one that runs completely in the back office. It may however engage humans for approvals, exception handling, or clarification through human in the loop tools
The Employee Onboarding agent automates the back-office processes involved in bringing a new employee into the organization. It coordinates tasks such as document verification, account creation, and provisioning resources, interacting with humans only for necessary approvals or clarifications.
use_case: The Employee Onboarding agent automates back-office operations for onboarding new employees. It handles document verification, account creation, and resource provisioning, engaging humans only for approvals or additional information when necessary.

tools.name: verify_documents
tools.description: Validates employee documents required for onboarding such as IDs and credentials.

tools.name: create_employee_account
tools.description: Creates an employee account in the company's IT system.

tools.name: provision_resources
tools.description: Allocates necessary resources such as hardware and software to the new employee.

tools.name: send_for_approval
tools.description: Sends requests for approval to managers for certain onboarding steps.

tools.name: human_in_the_loop_validation
tools.description: Engages a human reviewer for steps requiring subjective assessment, such as document validation.

tools.name: update_onboarding_status
tools.description: Updates the onboarding progress in the central system.

tools.name: check_process_completion
tools.description: Checks if all onboarding tasks have been completed successfully.

business_identifiers.account_id: Unique identifier for the employee's account
business_identifiers.approval_request_id: Unique identifier for the approval request
business_identifiers.document_id: Unique identifier for a specific document
